title: [SOLVED]A1151 graphic artefacts
message:
Hello, a customer brought in an A1151 vintage macbook pro with graphical artefacts, it shows like this:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/sB1cO1h.jpg[/img]
and then it remains like this:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/Ead97R4.jpg[/img]
Reball? new Gpu? tell him to fuck off?

title: [SOLVED]A1151 graphic artefacts
message: It needs a new GPU, just no, put it in the trash.

title: [SOLVED]A1151 graphic artefacts
message: Shame.. I like that machine. Next.
